title: #TGITMystery: Solve our secrets!
text:
TGIT Mystery: Solve our anchors' secrets! Post to Facebook #TGITMystery: Solve our secrets! TGIT Mystery: Solve our anchors' secrets! Check out this story on firstcoastnews.com: http://fcnews.tv/1Fh8o69 Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. Join the Conversation To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs #TGITMystery: Solve our secrets! 10:11 a.m. EDT October 22, 2015 Tweet us your best guesses about who it could be at First Coast News... with hashtag #TGITMystery (Photo: FCN) 13 CONNECT 88 TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
#TGIT is back on ABC 25! 
Hot dramas Grey's Anatomy, Scandal, and How To Get Away With Murder define the "Thank God It's Thursday" lineup on ABC.. and First Coast News is adding some mystery into the mix! 
We want you to solve our anchors' secrets.. We'll be sharing clues about a FCN personality every Thursday. 
Check back here for for updates throughout the day and follow us on Twitter and Instagram for more clues. Tweet us your best guesses with hashtag #TGITMystery. 
You can catch the big reveal Thursday night on First Coast News at 11:00. 
Tweet us your best guess @FCN2go with hashtag #TGITMystery and don't miss the #TGIT lineup tonight on ABC 25. (Photo: FCN)

LAST WEEK'S ANSWER: FCN anchor Heather Crawford fell out of a second story window as a child and didn't break a bone! WTLV <!--iframe-->
